message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my research and budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product.
